As soon as Blender an Stronghold heard the shots, Blender slahed across
Stranato's chest, spilling...him everywhere. Blender is thrown to the
ground. Serge is hit and stumbles forward some. Burning Hammer snaps Diskus'
head...off and rolls away from Rizopas. Rizopas's arm falls off. Burning
Hammer sees Serge stumble over because of Reptilica's missile flips onto
Serge's back. He rapidly slashs away at Serge's face. Serge falls over,
still not leeting go of Inzola. Burning Hammer laughed and let a pair of
large and sharp laser blade scissors flip from his arm in to his hand...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 07, 2000 8:34 AM
Subject: Re: Alliance and Preds, cease fire!...


>
> ::Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer::
>
> Reptilica growls. "Allright, this guy's pissin' me off," says the Alliance
> bot, flying back behind Serge.
>
> He aims at the back of the T-rex, firing one missile at the base of his
neck,
> and one at his back. With any luck, it'd cause the Maximal to drop Inzola.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Bloodystrike growls, flying down behind Blender, both guns blazing.
Several
> heavy-fire shots make their way toward Blender, a few dozen rapid-fire
ones
> accompanying them.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer spins around as he hears Stronghold's voice. He growls, aiming
his
> gun at Stronghold and firing shot after shot.
>
>
>
